Text:
it goes in C:\Program Files\Codemasters\Clive Barker's Jericho\bin
overwrite old files `YES`
that`s it.

I bought this game and own a legit copy of it (for once) and when I copy and paste the files in the "bin" folder in Jerhico there are no files that got replaces but simply added, and of course it still asks for my disk to play.

You want working crack?download it here:
http://www.filestube.com/71b448a98952581703e9/go.html
